CaseConfigOption.Name: BadAirway
CaseConfigOption.shortDescription: Patient has bad airway at start

CaseConfigOption.Name: PatientVomitsInitially
CaseConfigOption.shortDescription: Patient vomits quickly if not intubated

CaseConfigOption.Name: Bradycardia
CaseConfigOption.shortDescription: Patient becomes Bradycardic unless SAO2 is verified after ventilation

CaseConfigOption.Name: CuffError
CaseConfigOption.shortDescription: AutoBP reads Cuff Error if not manually verified

CaseConfigOption.Name: CombativePatient
CaseConfigOption.shortDescription: Patient becomes combative if not sedated

CaseConfigOption.Name: FASTDelayed
CaseConfigOption.shortDescription: The FAST Ultrasound is in use and delayed for 10 minutes.

CaseConfigOption.Name: VentilatorError
CaseConfigOption.shortDescription: Ventilator is incorrectly set at 40% when connected

CaseConfigOption.Name: PelvicBleeding
CaseConfigOption.shortDescription: Patient has Pelvic Fracture and internal bleeding

CaseConfigOption.Name: CardiacArrest
CaseConfigOption.shortDescription: Patient enters Cardiac Arrest and can be Defibrillated

CaseConfigOption.Name: VerbalWarnings
CaseConfigOption.shortDescription: Have Nurse warn the player when Vitals are critical

CaseConfigOption.Name: MissingXrayTech
CaseConfigOption.shortDescription: Delay availability of Xrays by 10 minutes
